name: EstimateMetricsOutput
description:
Estimate cardinality of a metric with specific settings.

Use this tool to get the estimated cardinality for a metric based on a specific tag, percentile, and number of aggregations configuration. This is useful for analyzing metric data within Datadog using Metrics without Limits™.

parameters.name: metric_name
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the metric for which to estimate cardinality.

parameters.name: filtered_tag_keys
parameters.description: Filtered tag keys that the metric is configured to query with, specified as a string.

value_schema.description: Filtered tag keys that the metric is configured to query with.

parameters.name: lookback_hours
parameters.description: Specify the number of hours to look back from the current time to estimate cardinality. Defaults to 0 if not provided.

value_schema.description: The number of hours of look back (from now) to estimate cardinality with. If unspecified, it defaults to 0 hours.

parameters.name: ignore_num_aggregations
parameters.description: This argument is deprecated and has no impact on volume estimation. It is ignored in the current tool implementation.

value_schema.description: Deprecated. Number of aggregations has no impact on volume.

parameters.name: lookback_timespan_hours
parameters.description: A window, in hours, from the lookback to estimate cardinality. Minimum is 1 hour.

value_schema.description: A window, in hours, from the look back to estimate cardinality with. The minimum and default is 1 hour.

parameters.name: include_percentile_aggregators
parameters.description: Boolean to estimate cardinality if distribution metrics have additional percentile aggregators.

value_schema.description: A boolean, for distribution metrics only, to estimate cardinality if the metric includes additional percentile aggregators.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: filter[groups]
parameters.description: Filtered tag keys that the metric is configured to query with.

value_schema.description: Filtered tag keys that the metric is configured to query with.

parameters.name: filter[hours_ago]
parameters.description: The number of hours of look back (from now) to estimate cardinality with. If unspecified, it defaults to 0 hours.

value_schema.description: The number of hours of look back (from now) to estimate cardinality with. If unspecified, it defaults to 0 hours.

parameters.name: filter[num_aggregations]
parameters.description: Deprecated. Number of aggregations has no impact on volume.

value_schema.description: Deprecated. Number of aggregations has no impact on volume.

parameters.name: filter[pct]
parameters.description: A boolean, for distribution metrics only, to estimate cardinality if the metric includes additional percentile aggregators.

value_schema.description: A boolean, for distribution metrics only, to estimate cardinality if the metric includes additional percentile aggregators.

parameters.name: filter[timespan_h]
parameters.description: A window, in hours, from the look back to estimate cardinality with. The minimum and default is 1 hour.

value_schema.description: A window, in hours, from the look back to estimate cardinality with. The minimum and default is 1 hour.
